meanings.sent1: The hungry dog will chomp on the bone.
meanings.sent2: She chomped on the apple eagerly.
meanings.sent3: The little boy pretended to chomp on his toy car.
meanings.sent4: The machine chomped through the metal effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The wrestler's jaws chomped down on his opponent's arm.

meanings.sent1: The chomp of the alligator echoed through the swamp.
meanings.sent2: I heard a loud chomp coming from the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character's exaggerated chomp made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The chomp of the old door closing signaled the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The monster's chomp in the movie made everyone jump in their seats.

meanings.sent1: The cows chomp on the grass in the field.
meanings.sent2: He chomped loudly on his gum during the movie.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel seemed to chomp on the nut with delight.
meanings.sent4: The old man chomped on his dentures absentmindedly.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the horse chomping on the hay filled the barn.
